# confirmationRequired(with:)

**Type Method**

Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.

## Declaration

```swift
class func confirmationRequired(with billPayeeToConfirm: INBillPayee?) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **billPayeeToConfirm**: The value that resolves the request, for the user to confirm.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBillPayeeResolutionResult] object.

## Discussion

Use this method when you can resolve the parameter to a single value but want the user to confirm that value.

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified value.
- **disambiguation(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to select from among the specified objects.
